Variables

HThemeManager

A single instance class.

The theme manager knows the name of the currently loaded theme and handles the loading of theme specific markup snippets and style declarations.

Summary
HThemeManager
A single instance class.
Instance variables
fetch
Loads a template file and returns its contents.
getThemeGfxPath
Returns the theme/component -specific path, called from inside css themes, a bit kludgy approach to tell the theme grapics file paths.
getCssFilePath
Returns the theme/component -specific graphics file path with proper css wrappers.
loadCSS
Loads a css file based on the given url (or file path).
loadMarkup
Loads HTML templates of components.
getMarkup
Loads CSS and HTML templates of components.
_componentGfxPath
Called via HView to determine the valid path prefix to aid finding theme- and component-specific image files.
setTheme
Sets the active theme.
restoreDefaultTheme
Sets the default theme ( HDefaultTheme ) to be the active theme.
_bindCSSVariables
Evaluates the _variable_match regular expression for the string _markup.

Instance variables

themePathRelative path to the components’ top directory.
currentThemeThe name of the theme currently in use.  Initially the default unnamed theme is used.
usesComponentDirTrue when the components are separated in their own directories, usually when using the source/development version.  False when the components are all in same directory.  This is the case in the release build.

See also

HView HMarkupView

fetch

fetch: function(_url,
_contentType)

Loads a template file and returns its contents.  If errors occurred, calls the error management functions.

Parameters

_urlA valid local file path or http url pointing to the resource to load.
_contentTypeAn optional parameter, specifies the content type wanted, defaults to text/html.

Returns

The contents of the path.

getThemeGfxPath

getThemeGfxPath: function()

Returns the theme/component -specific path, called from inside css themes, a bit kludgy approach to tell the theme grapics file paths.

getCssFilePath

getCssFilePath: function(_fileName)

Returns the theme/component -specific graphics file path with proper css wrappers.  Used from inside css themes, a bit kludgy approach to tell the file name path.

Parameters

_fileNameThe File name to load.

loadCSS

loadCSS: function(_url)

Loads a css file based on the given url (or file path).  Evaluates the css data.  Makes sure the browser uses the data for component styles.

Parameter

_urlA valid url that points to a valid css file.

Returns

The source of the url.

loadMarkup

loadMarkup: function(_themeName,
_componentName,
_themePath,
_pkgName)

Loads HTML templates of components.  Handles caching independently and intelligently.

Parameters

_themeNameThe name of the template to use.
_componentNameThe name of the component template (css/html) to load.
_themePath(Optional) parameter to override the global theme path.
_pkgPath(Optional) parameter to specify the package of the component, useful only in pre-built mode.

Returns

The Pre-Evaluated HTML Template.

getMarkup

getMarkup: function(_themeName,
_componentName,
_themePath,
_pkgName)

Loads CSS and HTML templates of components.  Called from <HView._loadMarkup>.  Returns the HTML Template as text.  Manages file caches independently and intelligently.

Parameters

_themeNameThe name of the template to use.
_componentNameThe name of the component template (css/html) to load.
_themePath(Optional) parameter to override the global theme path.
_pkgPath(Optional) parameter to specify the package of the component, useful only in pre-built mode.

Returns

The Pre-Evaluated HTML Template.

_componentGfxPath

_componentGfxPath: function(_themeName,
_componentName,
_themePath,
_pkgName)

Called via HView to determine the valid path prefix to aid finding theme- and component-specific image files.

Returns

A valid path, for example: ‘/helmi/themes/helmiTheme/gfx/’

setTheme

setTheme: function(_theme)

Sets the active theme.

Parameters

_themeThe name of the theme to be set as the active theme.

restoreDefaultTheme

restoreDefaultTheme: function()

Sets the default theme ( HDefaultTheme ) to be the active theme.

_bindCSSVariables

_bindCSSVariables: function(_cssTmpl)

Evaluates the _variable_match regular expression for the string _markup.

Parameters

_cssTmplThe css template file to be evaluated.

Returns

An evaluated CSS Template.

_bindCSSVariables: function(_cssTmpl)
Evaluates the _variable_match regular expression for the string _markup.
Abstract foundation class for all visual components.
Serves as a mixin class for classes that need to draw markup but don’t inherit from the HView.
